Sencast
  • Primary Production
  • View page source

Primary ProductionÔÉÅ

The Primary Production processor is an implementation of T.Soomets et al. 2019 in order to derive primary production from Satellite images.

processors.primaryproduction.primaryproduction.Fpar(z, q0par, M)ÔÉÅ
processors.primaryproduction.primaryproduction.M(qpar0, Cchl, Kpar)ÔÉÅ

processors.primaryproduction.primaryproduction.Qstarpar(z, q0par, Cchl)ÔÉÅ
processors.primaryproduction.primaryproduction.absorption(Cchl)ÔÉÅ
processors.primaryproduction.primaryproduction.datetomonth(date)ÔÉÅ
processors.primaryproduction.primaryproduction.pp_trapezoidal_numerical_integration(zvals, qpar0, Cchl, KdMorel)ÔÉÅ
processors.primaryproduction.primaryproduction.process(env, params, l1product_path, l2product_files, out_path)ÔÉÅ

Apply Primary Production adapter. 1. Calculates primary production for Chl and KD

ParametersÔÉÅ

env

Dictionary of environment parameters, loaded from input file

params

Dictionary of parameters, loaded from input file

l1product_path

unused

l2product_files

Dictionary of Level 2 product files created by processors

out_path

unused
